AND ?

INSERT INTO REVIEW ( RV_NO , MEM_NO , ORDER_NO , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_DATE , REVIEW_STAR , REVIEW_VIEW ) VALUES ( SEQ_RVNO , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , ? , DEFAULT )
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_VIEW = REVIEW_VIEW+1 WHERE RV_NO = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
